pli-tv-pvr10:15.3: (): _Tatthevāti vassaṃvutthāya cārikaṃapakkamitvā tattheva nivāsanaṃ paṭicca paññattasikkhāpadaṃ_, “_Tattheva_: the training rule laid down because of not going wandering after completing the rainy-season residence, but staying right there.” This refers to _bhikkhunī-pācittiya_ 40.
pli-tv-pvr10:18.1: (): _Dasa gārayhāti vosāsaappaṭisaṃ viditasikkhāpadadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesāni dasa pāṭidesanīyāni_, “_Dasa gārayhā_: apart from the two training rules on giving directions and without first making an announcement, the remaining ten rules entailing acknowledgment.”
pli-tv-pvr10:28.2: Reading _vipattiyo_ with the PTS edition in place of _vibhattiyo_.
pli-tv-pvr10:66.5: (): _Catutthagāthāya accayo tena samo natthīti desanāgāminīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi_, “In the fourth verse, ‘_accayo tena samo natthi_’ means that in regard to the offenses that are to be confessed, there is no serious offense that is equivalent to that.” I understand the meaning to be that the existing offense classes to not capture the actions mentioned here. Thus a new class of offenses is required.
